main event: Four boy scouts watched an oblong, sharply defined object about the size of a passenger plane. Two different objects were observed.
interesting points: The first object moved swiftly in a southwest direction, then stopped abruptly and descended rapidly and vertically behind the horizon.
A few minutes later, another identical object appeared and did exactly the same thing.
About two minutes after the second object disappeared, one of them came back up and hovered, then moved slightly to the west and set down out of sight.
The objects were illuminated by white and blue lights, and turned bright red as they moved.
The sighting occurred in an area of high intensity student aircraft activity, and the description is consistent with that of an aircraft.
sighted object: two oblong, sharply defined objects about the size of a passenger plane
